scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist && git rm -r --cache . && git reset && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:rules:prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:rules:dev: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:rules:test: firebase use test && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage
scripts.deploy:h:prod: npm run build && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:prod
scripts.deploy:h:dev: npm run build:dev && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev
scripts.build:test-no-minify: cross-env FIREBASE_TARGET=test tsc && cross-env FIREBASE_TARGET=test vite build --mode testing
scripts.deploy:h:test: npm run build:test-no-minify && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only hosting:test
scripts.deploy:f:prod: cd functions && npm run build && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:dev: cd functions && firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:f:test: cd functions && firebase use test && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:h:prod && npm run deploy:f:prod && npm run deploy:rules:prod
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:h:test && npm run deploy:f:test && npm run deploy:rules:test
